mapper.select: SELECT PATHNAME, FILENAME, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, RESOURCE_PATHNAME, REG_DATE FROM T_UPLOAD_FILE UF WHERE UF.UPLOAD_FILE_SEQ = #{uploadFileSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_UPLOAD_FILE ( PATHNAME, FILENAME, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, RESOURCE_PATHNAME, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{pathname}, #{filename}, #{originalFilename}, #{size}, #{contentType}, #{resourcePathname}, NOW() )
